meta_description.title: Ghosts 'n Goblins - Wikipedia
meta_description.text: Ghosts 'n Goblins, known in Japan as Makaimura is a run-and-gun platform video game series created by Tokuro Fujiwara and developed by Capcom.First release: Ghosts 'n Goblins; July 7, 1985Spin-offs: Gargoyle's Quest, Maximo‎Latest release: Ghosts 'n Goblins Resurrection; ...Genre(s): Run and gun, ‎platform‎‎Ghosts 'n Goblins Resurrection · ‎Ghosts 'n Goblins (video game) · ‎Ghouls 'n Ghosts

people_also_ask.heading: In spooky contexts, it can refer to any sinister creature—ghosts and goblins could both be generally referred to as ghouls. It can also refer to a person who enjoys disturbing or revolting things. The adjective ghoulish can describe such a person or their behavior.
people_also_ask.title: Ghosts, Ghouls, Goblins, And More – What's The Difference?

people_also_ask.heading: The Ghosts 'n Goblins series is notable for being extremely difficult, but Resurrection includes four difficulty levels that can make things a bit easier for players, including the ability to take multiple hits, reduce the number of enemies or even respawn instantly upon death.25-May-2021
people_also_ask.title: Ghosts 'n Goblins producer explains why 'easy mode' was ...

people_also_ask.heading: In modern times, the word ghoul is often used more generally. In spooky contexts, it can refer to any sinister creature—ghosts and goblins could both be generally referred to as ghouls. It can also refer to a person who enjoys disturbing or revolting things.
people_also_ask.title: Ghosts, Ghouls, Goblins, And More – What's The Difference?

people_also_ask.heading: Ghosts 'n Goblins Resurrection is a reboot of the old NES platformer Ghosts 'n Goblins, which was notorious for its challenging and, quite frankly, unforgiving gameplay. Since its original release, there have been many sequels and spin-offs of the series. 2021 marks the 35th anniversary of the series.03-May-2021

knowledge_panel.description: ghosts 'n goblins, known as makaimura in japan, is a side-scrolling platform game developed by capcom and released for arcades in 1985. it is the first game in the ghosts 'n goblins franchise, and has since been ported to numerous home platforms. wikipedia
